title: Chat disconected
body: okay so my brothers chat (menzy) and my own have been disconnected for over 2 days and we cant play with friends or anything, What should i do?

replies.body: Can you run a traceroute as requested in http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/IOJN4Luf-chat-not-working?show=flat&comment=003d and paste the results? This will help us narrow down potential causes.

Can you let us know if this is working now? If not, which ISP do you use and what location are you in? Thanks.
I just logged in from Comcast, Tucson, AZ. It hasn't been resolved. This is about the 14 hour mark.
